query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `workshops` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `factory_id` int NOT NULL,
  `code` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `floor` varchar(50),
  `building` varchar(100),
  `area` decimal(10,2),
  `area_unit` varchar(20) DEFAULT 'm2',
  `capacity` int,
  `manager_name` varchar(255),
  `manager_phone` varchar(50),
  `manager_email` varchar(255),
  `image_url` varchar(500),
  `floor_plan_url` varchar(500),
  `status` enum('active','inactive','maintenance') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  `is_active` int DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `idx_workshops_factory` (`factory_id`),
  INDEX `idx_workshops_code` (`code`),
  INDEX `idx_workshops_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_workshops_active` (`is_active`)
);
